document_data.name: Old Blue Stag
document_data.creator: [[Elvarado Chaserperi]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Old Blue Stag''' was a [[wine]] of the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Reputation: The wine was made from vineyards in [[Amn]], which belonged to [[Elvarado Chaserperi]]. The vintage was appreciated up and down the [[Sword Coast]].
